#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""Test script to benchmark performance of key operations."""

import time
import uuid

def benchmark_list_operations():
    """Benchmark list operations that are common in io_struct.py."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test list multiplication (current approach)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [False] * num
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test list comprehension
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [False for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"List multiplication [False] * num: {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"List comprehension [False for _ in range(num)]: {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Speedup: {time2/time1:.2f}x (multiplication is faster)")

def benchmark_uuid_generation():
    """Benchmark UUID generation."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test list comprehension (current approach)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        rids = [uuid.uuid4().hex for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test tuple unpacking (potential optimization)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        rids = tuple(uuid.uuid4().hex for _ in range(num))
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"UUID generation (list comp): {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"UUID generation (tuple): {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Average per iteration: {time1 / iterations * 1000:.4f}ms")

def benchmark_dict_operations():
    """Benchmark dict operations."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test dict multiplication
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [{}] * num
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test list comprehension with dict
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [{} for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"Dict list multiplication [{{}}] * num: {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Dict list comprehension [{{}} for _ in range(num)]: {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Note: List multiplication creates references to same dict!")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print("=" * 60)
    print("Performance Benchmark - List/Dict Operations")
    print("=" * 60)
    benchmark_list_operations()
    print()
    benchmark_uuid_generation()
    print()
    benchmark_dict_operations()
    print("=" * 60)

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""Test script to benchmark performance of key operations."""

import time
import uuid

def benchmark_list_operations():
    """Benchmark list operations that are common in io_struct.py."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test list multiplication (current approach)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [False] * num
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test list comprehension
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [False for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"List multiplication [False] * num: {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"List comprehension [False for _ in range(num)]: {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Speedup: {time2/time1:.2f}x (multiplication is faster)")

def benchmark_uuid_generation():
    """Benchmark UUID generation."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test list comprehension (current approach)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        rids = [uuid.uuid4().hex for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test tuple unpacking (potential optimization)
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        rids = tuple(uuid.uuid4().hex for _ in range(num))
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"UUID generation (list comp): {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"UUID generation (tuple): {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Average per iteration: {time1 / iterations * 1000:.4f}ms")

def benchmark_dict_operations():
    """Benchmark dict operations."""
    iterations = 10000
    num = 32
    
    # Test dict multiplication
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [{}] * num
    end = time.time()
    time1 = end - start
    
    # Test list comprehension with dict
    start = time.time()
    for _ in range(iterations):
        result = [{} for _ in range(num)]
    end = time.time()
    time2 = end - start
    
    print(f"Dict list multiplication [{{}}] * num: {time1:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Dict list comprehension [{{}} for _ in range(num)]: {time2:.4f}s for {iterations} iterations")
    print(f"Note: List multiplication creates references to same dict!")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print("=" * 60)
    print("Performance Benchmark - List/Dict Operations")
    print("=" * 60)
    benchmark_list_operations()
    print()
    benchmark_uuid_generation()
    print()
    benchmark_dict_operations()
    print("=" * 60)
